step_feedback.feedback: Good job bringing your arms in front of your chest and tightening your muscles. Ensure your fists are closed tightly.
You're opening your fingers and extending your arms well. Try to relax your muscles more as you exhale and extend.
Excellent work on opening your fingers and extending your arms. Keep up the good form.
Your arm extension is good. Focus on a smooth exhale as you relax your muscles and extend outwards.
Great job completing the repetitions! Remember to fully open your fingers and relax your muscles as you extend your arms.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the horizontal pumping exercise! Remember to fully close your fists and tighten your muscles when bringing your arms in, and then open your fingers and relax as you extend them outwards. Keep practicing this smooth motion.
